divs: sighting detailswell it was late in the night i was alone out side and my brother was with his freind axross the street' im sure the derection of it was north of fresno ca . it had a bright white haze around it it was circle and moving slow but im sure it was moving way faster than that cuase it had dissapperd in a cluster of stars way out of our solar system the light went away . as i thoguht in my head to my self i said ""i see you"" cuase im not the ufo kinda guy . thats when it had left ... later that night i only told my brother cuase i did not want any one to think im crazzy . after i had prayed to it hoping some how it can read my thoughts. when i was younger my dad and i seen a '6 million dallar man ' eppisode when a ufo crashes and these people like things can read minds andbut they want there ship crashes and they cant get back to were they are from ... im sure to some this might sound dumb . but im my self i seen what i had seen . 7\6\13 ... my feeling was weird and did not seem very real until it had left i first noticed it when i was looking at the stars just thinking . was not a plane a plane cannot leave our solar system and a rocket i know what those look like . i wish i had a pic of it if i had one every last soul would belive in some type of smarter being out there then just us"
